## jx-secret edit

Edits any missing properties in the ExternalSecret resources

### Usage

```
jx-secret edit
```

### Synopsis

Edits any missing properties in the ExternalSecret resources

### Examples

  jx-secret edit

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for edit
  -n, --ns string   the namespace to filter the ExternalSecret resources
```
